Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.servertoclient

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    EventToClientNotifier
    This interface contains the list of methods that the server could use to send different events to the client.
    EventToClientVisitor
    This interface contains the list of the event that the client could receive from the server.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    EndGameToClient
    This class represents the end game event to send to the client.
    EventToClient
    This abstract class is used to generalize the event to sent from the server to the client.
    LorenzoActionToClient
    This class represents the event to send to the client for the notification of a Lorenzo action.
    NewTurnToClient
    This class represents the event to client for the notification of a new turn and for the update of information.
    NotifyToClient
    This class represents the event to send to client used for a notify.
    PingToClient
    This event represents the ping that verifies that the client is connected.
    SendArrayLeaderCardsToClient
    This class represents the event to send to the client for the leader card turn.
    SendInitialResourcesToClient
    This class represents the event to send to the client for the choice of the initial resources in the set up of the game.
    SendReorganizeDepositToClient
    This class represents the event to notify the client that has to reorganize the deposit.
    SendSpaceDevelopmentCardToClient
    This class represents the event to send to the client to choose the space in which put the development card bought by the player.
    TurnReselectionToClient
    This class represents the event to send to the client for the reselection of the turn.
